definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 77a, 1. 13 fr. below: [[אֵשׁ]] ‘m.’ is dub.: Nu 16:18 rd. [[עָלֶיהָ]] for 2nd [[עֲלֵיהֶם]] (LXX.:B); Je 20:9 v. Ges:§ 132 d; Je 48:45 rd. (many MSS., Nu 21:23) [[יחאה]]; Ps 104:4 rd. perh. (Ol Du) : [[םהֵֽטָה]], or [[וָלֽחַט]]; Job 20:26 v. Ges:§ 145 u (or 121 b): cf,. Albr:ZAW xvi (1896). 63.
